scripts.test: RMF_API_SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=CRITICAL python3 -m pipenv run python -m unittest discover -s api_server -t .
scripts.test:integration: RMF_API_SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=CRITICAL python3 -m pipenv run python -m unittest discover -s tests -t .
scripts.test:cov: RMF_API_SERVER_LOG_LEVEL=CRITICAL RMF_API_SERVER_TEST_COVERAGE=1 python3 -m pipenv run python -m coverage run -p -m unittest
scripts.test:report: python3 -m pipenv run python -m coverage combine && python3 -m pipenv run python -m coverage html && xdg-open htmlcov/index.html
scripts.lint: python3 -m pipenv run pylint api_server tests
